help.title: Help & Support
help.description: Get help and learn more about Itinerary
help.faq1Question: How do I create a new itinerary?
help.faq1Answer: To create a new itinerary, click the "Create New" button on the home page or in the navigation menu.
help.faq2Question: How do I invite friends to my itinerary?
help.faq2Answer: Open your itinerary and go to the "People" tab. Click "Invite More Friends" and enter their email or phone number.
help.faq3Question: How do I split expenses with my group?
help.faq3Answer: In your itinerary, go to the "Expenses" tab. Add expenses and select how you want to split them among your group.
